title: Started the MSc in AI
description: Started my Master's Degree in Artificial Intelligence at Bocconi University.

title: Graduating from BEMACS
description: Graduated from my Bachelor's degree with a thesis on the impact of irony in toxicity rating by raters belonging to different social groups. Final grade: 110 cum Laude.

title: Exchange Program at Georgia Tech
description: Attend a semester at Georgia Institute of Technology in Atlanta (GA). GPA: 4.0/4.

title: Astra wins elections in Bocconi
description: I helped co-ordinate the virtual and physical marketing activities that helped Astra win a majority of seats in its first election.

title: Foundation of Astra Bocconi
description: Founded a new student representatives group in my University.

title: Started BEMACS
description: Began my undergraduate studies in the Bachelor of Economics, Management and Computer Science (BEMACS) at Bocconi University. GPA: 29/30.
